name: Destiny Gear Viewer
description: A tool for viewing Destiny gear assets in 3D.

name: CHWT Warmind
description: A Warmind Application for the ChattWhyte Krew. Contains an events correlation engine (stack bounties on activities and quest lines) and a Discord Bot with a fireteam event scheduler.

name: Warmind Network
description: An Alexa skill for helping players manage their in game inventory and create load outs.
